notesStmt.note: Very dark roll of red leather with one column almost intact. Lines are carefully ruled. Stitching on right only; writing on one side only. Not yet fully catalogued. Metadata based on image and Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) data. Title based on Prof. Robert A. Kraft's 1990 survey of University Museum Hebrew Manuscripts. Dark, nearly black, leather.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology
